title: Why are people so confused with the COVID-19 masks? - Quora

response.answer_text: To have confusion regarding the usage of masks is so normal. Due to the following reasons : Lack of Awareness - Half of the population doesn't know which masks are very much situation. How to wear it, where to keep it.Fake Masks - With the rise in the spread of virus the demand for the masks has been increased and for which many manufacturing companies have come in the market and producing masks which we don't know, how safe it's for the consumers.Risks - Even if the people are wearing masks, there's still the chance for the germs to spread. Also, nobody knows, how one keeps the masks at home. Is it still safe to wear? Most of the people are just wearing it for the sake of it.Reusable - Not masks can be reused. Some masks are made for one time use because it contains those chemicals which may not effective once washed.Breathable - Not all masks we wear are pure and breathable.So, there are pure chances of the people to get confused.

Nobody want to compare the size of the corona virus and everybody wants to just follow the media blindly. The moment we start cross checking, immediately we shall realise how media has been diverting our thought pattern and belief at a subtle level. Intelligent people would always have the clarity.
